snippet: The Essence Music Festival, now in its 18th year, is devoted to guarding against crisis — of marriages, of faith, of employment, of confidence, of leadership, of the black middle class.
abstract: Essence Music Festival, event sponsored by Essence Magazine, is focused on themes of love, sex and religion, targeting its audience of black, female, middle-class women; festival, now in its 18th year, has become an important event in non-hip-hop black pop for an entire generation.
lead_paragraph: The Essence Music Festival, now in its 18th year, is devoted to guarding against crisis — of marriages, of faith, of employment, of confidence, of leadership, of the black middle class.

headline.seo: Essence Music Festival With Mary J. Blige, in New Orleans
headline.main: A Crowd That Knows the Menu
headline.print_headline: A Crowd That Knows The Menu
